name: Discord Q&A Bot
description: Discord Q&A bot with Whop subscription gating and knowledge base support

DISCORD_TOKEN.description: Discord bot token from Discord Developer Portal

WHOP_API_KEY.description: Whop API key for subscription verification

WHOP_PRODUCT_ID.description: Whop product ID for the Pro Bot plan

FIREBASE_PRIVATE_KEY.description: Firebase service account private key (escape newlines: replace \n with \\n)

SERVICE_ACCOUNT_JSON.description: Alternative: Full Firebase service account JSON (escape newlines: replace \n with \\n)

FREE_TIER_MESSAGE_LIMIT.description: Number of messages allowed per month for free tier

ALLOWED_ORIGINS.description: Comma-separated list of allowed CORS origins (Firebase Hosting URLs)

scripts.postdeploy: echo 'Deployment complete! Configure your environment variables in Heroku dashboard.'
